snippet: The painting, “Seated Woman/Woman Sitting in Armchair,” was among more than 1,280 works held in a private collection. The new claimant was not identified, and no details about the case were provided.
abstract: The painting, “Seated Woman/Woman Sitting in Armchair,” was among more than 1,280 works held in a private collection. The new claimant was not identified, and no details about the case were provided.

headline.main: 2nd Claim Will Delay Return of Matisse Painting From Trove of Looted Art
